query:
SELECT 
    a.id,
    a.address,
    a.total_trades,
    a.settled_count,
    a.win_count,
    a.loss_count,
    a.avg_trade_size,
    COUNT(at.id) as actual_trade_count
FROM addresses a
LEFT JOIN address_trades at ON a.id = at.address_id
WHERE a.id = 1
GROUP BY a.id
